name: Adventure Medical Kits GlacierGel Blister & Burn Dressing
description: Getting blistered or burned is always a possibility in the backcountry. GlacierGel is 50% water, so it starts cooling and relieving pain as soon as you apply it. The pads go on as easily as a band-aid. Just peel the backing membrane off and apply. No tape needed.Waterproof, breathable gels pads cushion, cool and absorb for instant pain relief and quick healing.Pads keep blisters clean and protected while allowing moisture to escape the dressing.Transparent so you can monitor the injury without removing the dressing.Adhesive stays in place up to 4 days.Includes alcohol wipes for skin preparation.Includes 2, 2.5 x 3.1cm patches and 2, 4.4 x 7.6cm.
